title: Is speed reading not good? - Quora

response.answer_text: Hi, Sunil. I’ve tackled this question on here numerous times and I can only say I haven’t changed my mind. In my opinion, speed reading is no substitute for careful, considered reading even if it reduces your reading time by 60 percent! Time spent absorbing is not time wasted. If you want my fuller answers, check me out on Google where you will find all my stuff, including my speed reading responses.
